translations: v.使高兴；觉得高兴；外出玩乐（pleasure 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: 快乐原则；避苦趋乐的本能

sentences.sentence: Why should you deprive yourself of such simple pleasures?
sentences.translation: 你为什么连这种简单的娱乐也不让自己享受一下呢？

sentences.sentence: It was she who first introduced the pleasures of sailing to me.
sentences.translation: 是她最先使我体会到了帆船运动的乐趣。

sentences.sentence: One of the greatest pleasures of this job is meeting people from all walks of life.
sentences.translation: 这份工作最大的乐趣之一就是结识来自各行各业的人。
